                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                          • clusterID: required (string)

                                                                                          put /2.0/nwfabric/clusters/{clusterID}

                                                                                          Update the locale ID on a cluster

                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                          • clusterID: required (string)

                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                          <nwFabricClusterConfig>
    <localeId></localeId>
</nwFabricClusterConfig>

                                                                                          delete /2.0/nwfabric/clusters/{clusterID}

                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                          • clusterID: required (string)

                                                                                          /2.0/nwfabric/hosts/{hostID} get put delete

                                                                                          Network virtualization component host configuration

                                                                                          get

                                                                                          Read the locale ID on a host

                                                                                          put

                                                                                          Update the locale ID on a host

                                                                                          delete

                                                                                          Delete locale ID on a host

                                                                                          get /2.0/nwfabric/hosts/{hostID}

                                                                                          Read the locale ID on a host

                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                          • hostID: required (string)

                                                                                          put /2.0/nwfabric/hosts/{hostID}

                                                                                          Update the locale ID on a host

                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                          • hostID: required (string)

                                                                                          Body

                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                          Schema:

                                                                                          <nwFabricHostConfig>
    <localeId></localeId>
</nwFabricHostConfig>

                                                                                          delete /2.0/nwfabric/hosts/{hostID}

                                                                                          Delete locale ID on a host

                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                          • hostID: required (string)

                                                                                          securityFabric

                                                                                          Security fabric

                                                                                          /2.0/si/deploy post put

                                                                                          post

                                                                                          Deploy security fabric

                                                                                          put

                                                                                          Upgrade service to recent version

                                                                                          post /2.0/si/deploy

                                                                                          Deploy security fabric

                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                          • startTime: (string)

                                                                                            Time to start deployment task. If not specified, deploy immediately

                                                                                          Body

                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                          Schema:

                                                                                          <clusterDeploymentConfigs>
    <clusterDeploymentConfig>
        <clusterId></clusterId>
        <datastore></datastore>
        <services>
            <serviceDeploymentConfig>
                <serviceId></serviceId>
                <dvPortGroup></dvPortGroup>
                <ipPool></ipPool>
            </serviceDeploymentConfig>
        </services>
    </clusterDeploymentConfig>
</clusterDeploymentConfigs>

                                                                                          put /2.0/si/deploy

                                                                                          Upgrade service to recent version

                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                          • startTime: (string)

                                                                                            optional; specify time to start upgrade

                                                                                          Body

                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                          Schema:

                                                                                          <clusterDeploymentConfigs>
    <clusterDeploymentConfig>
        <clusterId></clusterId>
        <datastore></datastore>
        <services>
            <serviceDeploymentConfig>
                <serviceId></serviceId>
                <serviceInstanceId></serviceInstanceId>
                <dvPortGroup></dvPortGroup>
                <ipPool></ipPool>
            </serviceDeploymentConfig>
        </services>
    </clusterDeploymentConfig>
</clusterDeploymentConfigs>

                                                                                          /2.0/si/deploy/service/{serviceID} get delete

                                                                                          Working with a specified service

                                                                                          get

                                                                                          Retrieve all clusters on which the service is installed

                                                                                          delete

                                                                                          Uninstall specified service from specified clusters

                                                                                          get /2.0/si/deploy/service/{serviceID}

                                                                                          Retrieve all clusters on which the service is installed

                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                          • serviceID: required (string)

                                                                                            Specified service

                                                                                          delete /2.0/si/deploy/service/{serviceID}

                                                                                          Uninstall specified service from specified clusters

                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                          • serviceID: required (string)

                                                                                            Specified service

                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                          • clusters: (string)

                                                                                            Comma-separated list of cluster id's that service needs to be uninstalled from

                                                                                          • startTime: (string)

                                                                                            Time for uninstall to be scheduled. If not specified, uninstall immediately

                                                                                          /2.0/si/deploy/service/{serviceID}/dependsOn get

                                                                                          Identify service on which the specified service depends on

                                                                                          get

                                                                                          Identify service on which the specified service depends on

                                                                                          get /2.0/si/deploy/service/{serviceID}/dependsOn

                                                                                          Identify service on which the specified service depends on

                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                          • serviceID: required (string)

                                                                                            Specified service

                                                                                          /2.0/si/deploy/cluster/{clusterID} get delete

                                                                                          Working with installed services on a cluster

                                                                                          get

                                                                                          Retrieve all services deployed along with their status

                                                                                          delete

                                                                                          Uninstall a service. Fails if you try to remove a service that another service depends on

                                                                                          get /2.0/si/deploy/cluster/{clusterID}

                                                                                          Retrieve all services deployed along with their status

                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                          • clusterID: required (string)

                                                                                            Cluster ID

                                                                                          delete /2.0/si/deploy/cluster/{clusterID}

                                                                                          Uninstall a service. Fails if you try to remove a service that another service depends on

                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                          • clusterID: required (string)

                                                                                            Cluster ID

                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                          • services: (string)

                                                                                            Comma-separated list of service id's to specify which services to uninstall

                                                                                          • startTime: (string)

                                                                                            time for uninstall to be scheduled. If not specified, do immediately

                                                                                          /2.0/si/deploy/cluster/{clusterID}/service/{serviceID} get

                                                                                          Information about a service

                                                                                          get

                                                                                          Retrieve detailed information about the service

                                                                                          get /2.0/si/deploy/cluster/{clusterID}/service/{serviceID}

                                                                                          Retrieve detailed information about the service

                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                          • clusterID: required (string)

                                                                                            Cluster ID

                                                                                          • serviceID: required (string)

                                                                                            Service ID on cluster

                                                                                            /2.0/dlp/policy/regulations put

                                                                                            Enable one or more regulations by putting the regulation IDs into the policy. You can get the IDs from the output of the dlpRegulation GET call

                                                                                            put

                                                                                            Enable one or more regulations by putting the regulation IDs into the policy. You can get the IDs from the output of the dlpRegulation GET call

                                                                                            put /2.0/dlp/policy/regulations

                                                                                            Enable one or more regulations by putting the regulation IDs into the policy. You can get the IDs from the output of the dlpRegulation GET call

                                                                                            Secured by basic
                                                                                            • Request

                                                                                            Type: application/xml

                                                                                            Schema:

    <long></long>
</set>

                                                                                            /2.0/dlp/classificationvalue get

                                                                                            Classification values associated with regulations

                                                                                            get

                                                                                            Get all classification values

                                                                                            get /2.0/dlp/classificationvalue

                                                                                            Get all classification values

                                                                                            Secured by basic

                                                                                              /2.0/dlp/policy/classificationvalues put

                                                                                              Configure a customized regex as a classification value

                                                                                              put

                                                                                              Configure a customized regex as a classification value

                                                                                              put /2.0/dlp/policy/classificationvalues

                                                                                              Configure a customized regex as a classification value

                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                              Body

                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                              <set>
    <ClassificationValue>
        <id></id>
        <classification>
            <id></id>
            <name></name>
            <providerName></providerName>
            <description></description>
            <customizable></customizable>
        </classification>
        <value></value>
    </ClassificationValue>
</set>

                                                                                                          /2.0/dlp/scanstatus get

                                                                                                          Retrieve the status of a scan operation

                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                          Retrieve the status of a scan operation

                                                                                                          get /2.0/dlp/scanstatus

                                                                                                          Retrieve the status of a scan operation

                                                                                                          Secured by basic

                                                                                                            /2.0/dlp/scan/current/vms/{ID} get

                                                                                                            Retrieve information about the vm's being scanned

                                                                                                            get

                                                                                                            Retrieve information about the vm's being scanned

                                                                                                            get /2.0/dlp/scan/current/vms/{ID}

                                                                                                            Retrieve information about the vm's being scanned

                                                                                                            Secured by basic
                                                                                                            • Request

                                                                                                            URI Parameters

                                                                                                            • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                              Limit filter results by VC MOID of datacenter, cluster, or resource pool

                                                                                                            Query Parameters

                                                                                                            • scanstatus: (string)

                                                                                                              Specify scan status of vm's to be retrieved (all|notstarted|started|completed)

                                                                                                            • pagesize: (string - default: 256)

                                                                                                              Limit max number of entries returned. Valid range is 1-1024

                                                                                                            • startindex: (string)

                                                                                                              Specify starting point for retrieving logs

                                                                                                                  eventControl

                                                                                                                  eventControl Operations

                                                                                                                  /1.0/eventcontrol/vm/{vmID}/request post

                                                                                                                  Enable or disable data collection on a virtual machine

                                                                                                                  post

                                                                                                                  Enable or disable data collection on a virtual machine

                                                                                                                  post /1.0/eventcontrol/vm/{vmID}/request

                                                                                                                  Enable or disable data collection on a virtual machine

                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                  • vmID: required (string)

                                                                                                                    MOID of the guest vm

                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                  <perVmConfig>
    <actions>
        <action>
            <type></type>
            <value></value>
        </action>
    </actions>
</perVmConfig>

                                                                                                                  /1.0/eventcontrol/eventcontrol-root/request post

                                                                                                                  Data collection kill switch on/off

                                                                                                                  post

                                                                                                                  Turn on/off data collection at global level

                                                                                                                  Turn on/off data collection at global level

                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                  <request>
    <actions>
        <action>
            <type></type>
            <value></value>
        </action>
    </actions>
</request>

                                                                                                                  activityMonitoring

                                                                                                                  Activity monitoring

                                                                                                                  /3.0/ai/records get

                                                                                                                  Get aggregated user activity (action records) using parameters. Requires vShield Endpoint and NSX Endpoint configured, and Data collection enabled on 1+ vm's

                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                  Get aggregated user activity

                                                                                                                  get /3.0/ai/records

                                                                                                                  Get aggregated user activity

                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                                                  • query: required (string - default: resource)

                                                                                                                    Name of report (resource,adg,containers,sam,vma)

                                                                                                                  • interval: required (string)

                                                                                                                    Relative time to current time (number followed by either m,h,d,s)

                                                                                                                    Example:

                                                                                                                    60m
                                                                                                                  • stime: (string - default: 2012-02-28T21:00)

                                                                                                                    Start time for query

                                                                                                                  • etime: (string - default: 2012-02-29T21:00)

                                                                                                                    End time for query

                                                                                                                  • param: (string - default: src:SECURITY_GROUP:1:INCLUDE)

                                                                                                                    Parameter to be applied to query (:::operator)

                                                                                                                  • pagesize: (string - default: 1000)

                                                                                                                    Number of records to retrieve (recommended between 100-2000)

                                                                                                                  • startindex: (string - default: 100)

                                                                                                                    Start record number for pagination

                                                                                                                  /3.0/ai/userdetails get

                                                                                                                  Retrieve user detail records in accordance with given query parameters

                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                  Retrieve user detail records in accordance with given query parameters

                                                                                                                  get /3.0/ai/userdetails

                                                                                                                  Retrieve user detail records in accordance with given query parameters

                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                                                  • query: required (string - default: resource)

                                                                                                                    Name of report (resource,adg,containers,sam,vma)

                                                                                                                  • interval: required (string)

                                                                                                                    Relative time to current time (number followed by either m,h,d,s)

                                                                                                                    Example:

                                                                                                                    60m
                                                                                                                  • stime: (string - default: 2012-02-28T21:00)

                                                                                                                    Start time for query

                                                                                                                  • etime: (string - default: 2012-02-29T21:00)

                                                                                                                    End time for query

                                                                                                                  • param: (string - default: src:SECURITY_GROUP:1:INCLUDE)

                                                                                                                    Parameter to be applied to query (:::operator)

                                                                                                                  • pagesize: (string - default: 1000)

                                                                                                                    Number of records to retrieve (recommended between 100-2000)

                                                                                                                  • startindex: (string - default: 100)

                                                                                                                    Start record number for pagination

                                                                                                                  /3.0/ai/user/{userID} get

                                                                                                                        Retrieve specific desktop pool details

                                                                                                                        Secured by basic
                                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                                                                        • desktoppoolID: required (string)

                                                                                                                          Specified desktop pool

                                                                                                                              Register or update a domain with NSX Manager

                                                                                                                              post /3.0/directory/updateDomain

                                                                                                                              Register or update a domain with NSX Manager

                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                              <DirectoryDomain>
    <name></name>
    <type></type>
    <netbiosName></netbiosName>
    <username></username>
    <password></password>
</DirectoryDomain>

                                                                                                                                            /2.0/si/fabric/sync/conflicts get put

                                                                                                                                            Working with conflicting agencies

                                                                                                                                            get

                                                                                                                                            Retrieve conflicting Deployment Units and EAM Agencies, if any, and the allowed operations on them

                                                                                                                                            put

                                                                                                                                            Create deployment units for conflicting EAM Agencies, delete conflicting EAM agencies, or delete deployment units for conflicting EAM agencies

                                                                                                                                            get /2.0/si/fabric/sync/conflicts

                                                                                                                                            Retrieve conflicting Deployment Units and EAM Agencies, if any, and the allowed operations on them

                                                                                                                                            Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                              put /2.0/si/fabric/sync/conflicts

                                                                                                                                              Create deployment units for conflicting EAM Agencies, delete conflicting EAM agencies, or delete deployment units for conflicting EAM agencies

                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                              macsetScopes

                                                                                                                                              Create or list MACsets on a specified scope

                                                                                                                                              /2.0/services/macset/{scopeId} post get

                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                              Create a MACset on a specified scope

                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                              List MACsets created on a specified scope

                                                                                                                                              post /2.0/services/macset/{scopeId}

                                                                                                                                              Create a MACset on a specified scope

                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                              • scopeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                Can be globalroot-0 or datacenterId in upgrade use cases

                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                              <macset>
    <objectId></objectId>
    <type>
        <typeName></typeName>
    </type>
    <description></description> 
    <name></name>
    <revision></revision>
    <objectTypeName></objectTypeName>
    <value></value> 
</macset>

                                                                                                                                              get /2.0/services/macset/{scopeId}

                                                                                                                                              List MACsets created on a specified scope

                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                              • scopeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                Can be globalroot-0 or datacenterId in upgrade use cases

                                                                                                                                              macset

                                                                                                                                              Operations on an individual MACset

                                                                                                                                              /2.0/services/macset/{macsetId} get put delete

                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                              Retrieve details about a MACset

                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                              Modify an existing MACset

                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                              Delete a MACset

                                                                                                                                              get /2.0/services/macset/{macsetId}

                                                                                                                                              Retrieve details about a MACset

                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                              • macsetId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                Specified MACset ID (Can be retrieved by listing the MACset on a scope)

                                                                                                                                              put /2.0/services/macset/{macsetId}

                                                                                                                                              Modify an existing MACset

                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                              • macsetId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                Specified MACset ID (Can be retrieved by listing the MACset on a scope)

                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                              <macset>
    <objectId></objectId>
    <type>
        <typeName></typeName>
    </type>
    <description></description> 
    <name></name>
    <revision></revision>
    <objectTypeName></objectTypeName>
    <value></value> 
</macset>

                                                                                                                                              delete /2.0/services/macset/{macsetId}

                                                                                                                                              Delete a MACset

                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                              • macsetId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                Specified MACset ID (Can be retrieved by listing the MACset on a scope)

                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                              • force: (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                Indicates forced or unforced delete. With forced delete, the object is deleted even if used in other places such as firewall rules, causing invalid referrals. For unforced delete, the object is deleted only if it is no used by other configurations; otherwise the delete fails

                                                                                                                                              taskFramework

                                                                                                                                              Working with filtering criteria and paging information for jobs on the task framework

                                                                                                                                              /2.0/services/taskservice/job get

                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                              Query job instances by criterion

                                                                                                                                              get /2.0/services/taskservice/job

                                                                                                                                              Query job instances by criterion

                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                              • startIndex: (integer)

                                                                                                                                                Start index (0 by default)

                                                                                                                                              • pageSize: (integer)

                                                                                                                                                Page size (10 by default)

                                                                                                                                              • sortBy: (string)

                                                                                                                                                Always sorted by "startTime"

                                                                                                                                              • sortOrderAscending: (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                Sort in ascending order of start time (true/false)

                                                                                                                                              /2.0/services/taskservice/job/{jobId} get

                                                                                                                                              Job instances on the task framework

                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                              Retrieve all job instances for the specified job ID

                                                                                                                                              get /2.0/services/taskservice/job/{jobId}

                                                                                                                                              Retrieve all job instances for the specified job ID

                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                              • jobId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                Specified job Id

</VendorInfo>

                                                                                                                                                delete

                                                                                                                                                Unregister a vendor

                                                                                                                                                post /2.0/endpointsecurity/registration/{vendorID}

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                                Type: application/xml

    <altitude></altitude>
    <title></title>
    <description></description>
</SolutionInfo>
