                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                                /2.0/endpointsecurity/registration/{vendorID}/{altitude} get delete

                                                                                                                                                Solution registration information

                                                                                                                                                get

                                                                                                                                                Get registration information for a given solution

                                                                                                                                                delete

                                                                                                                                                Unregister a solution

                                                                                                                                                get /2.0/endpointsecurity/registration/{vendorID}/{altitude}

                                                                                                                                                Get registration information for a given solution

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                                • altitude: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

                                                                                                                                                delete /2.0/endpointsecurity/registration/{vendorID}/{altitude}

                                                                                                                                                Unregister a solution

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                                • altitude: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

                                                                                                                                                /2.0/endpointsecurity/registration/{vendorID}/{altitude}/location post delete

                                                                                                                                                IP address and port for a solution

                                                                                                                                                post

                                                                                                                                                Set a solution's IP address and port on the vNIC host

                                                                                                                                                delete

                                                                                                                                                Unset a solution's IP address and port

                                                                                                                                                post /2.0/endpointsecurity/registration/{vendorID}/{altitude}/location

                                                                                                                                                Set a solution's IP address and port on the vNIC host

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                                • altitude: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

                                                                                                                                                Body

                                                                                                                                                Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                Schema:

                                                                                                                                                <LocationInfo>
    <ip></ip>
    <port></port>
</LocationInfo>

                                                                                                                                                delete /2.0/endpointsecurity/registration/{vendorID}/{altitude}/location

                                                                                                                                                Unset a solution's IP address and port

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                                • altitude: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

                                                                                                                                                /2.0/endpointsecurity/registration/{vendorID}/{altitude}/{moid} get

                                                                                                                                                Solution activation status, given the managed object reference of its virtual machine

                                                                                                                                                get

                                                                                                                                                Get the solution activation status

                                                                                                                                                get /2.0/endpointsecurity/registration/{vendorID}/{altitude}/{moid}

                                                                                                                                                Get the solution activation status

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                                • altitude: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

                                                                                                                                                • moid: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  managed object reference

                                                                                                                                                vShieldSolutionActivation

                                                                                                                                                vShield solution activation

                                                                                                                                                /2.0/endpointsecurity/activation get

                                                                                                                                                get

                                                                                                                                                Retrieve activation information for all activated security vm's on the specified host

                                                                                                                                                get /2.0/endpointsecurity/activation

                                                                                                                                                Retrieve activation information for all activated security vm's on the specified host

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                • hostId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  Specified host ID

                                                                                                                                                /2.0/endpointsecurity/activation/{vendorID}/{solutionID} get

                                                                                                                                                Activated security virtual machines

                                                                                                                                                get

                                                                                                                                                Get a list of activated security vm's for the specified solution

                                                                                                                                                get /2.0/endpointsecurity/activation/{vendorID}/{solutionID}

                                                                                                                                                Get a list of activated security vm's for the specified solution

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                                • solutionID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  solution ID

                                                                                                                                                /2.0/endpointsecurity/activation/{vendorID}/{altitude} post

                                                                                                                                                Activate a registered vShield solution

                                                                                                                                                post

                                                                                                                                                Activate a solution that has been registered and located

                                                                                                                                                post /2.0/endpointsecurity/activation/{vendorID}/{altitude}

                                                                                                                                                Activate a solution that has been registered and located

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                                • altitude: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

                                                                                                                                                Body

                                                                                                                                                Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                Schema:

                                                                                                                                                <ActivationInfo>
    <moid></moid>
</ActivationInfo>

                                                                                                                                                /2.0/endpointsecurity/activation/{vendorID}/{altitude}/{moid} delete

                                                                                                                                                Deactivate a solution on a host

                                                                                                                                                delete

                                                                                                                                                Deactivate a solution on a host

                                                                                                                                                delete /2.0/endpointsecurity/activation/{vendorID}/{altitude}/{moid}

                                                                                                                                                Deactivate a solution on a host

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                                • altitude: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

                                                                                                                                                • moid: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  Managed object reference of VM

                                                                                                                                                dfw

                                                                                                                                                Distributed Firewall Operations

                                                                                                                                                /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config get put delete

                                                                                                                                                Global Distributed Firewall Rules configuration

                                                                                                                                                get

                                                                                                                                                Global Distributed Firewall Rules configuration, use query Parameters to filter

                                                                                                                                                put

                                                                                                                                                This will update the complete firewall configuration in all sections. You will need to get the Etag value out of the GET (dfwConfigShow) first. Then pass the modified version of the whole firewall configuration in the GET body

                                                                                                                                                delete

                                                                                                                                                Restores default configuration, which means one defaultLayer3 section with default allow rule and one defaultLayer2Section with default allow rule

                                                                                                                                                get /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config

                                                                                                                                                Global Distributed Firewall Rules configuration, use query Parameters to filter

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                • ruleType: (string)

                                                                                                                                                  ruleType can be LAYER3, LAYER2, L3REDIRECT. Rule Type is mandatory if other search parameters are sent

                                                                                                                                                • source: (string)

                                                                                                                                                  source/destination can contain IPv4/v6 address or vm‐id

                                                                                                                                                • ruleId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                  filter by ruleId

                                                                                                                                                • comment: (string)

                                                                                                                                                  comment can contain any portion of the comment entered for the rules. Search is case insensitive

                                                                                                                                                • name: (string)

                                                                                                                                                  name can contain any portion of the rulename entered for the rules. Search is case insensitive

                                                                                                                                                • siProfile: (string)

                                                                                                                                                  siProfile can contain any portion of the ServiceProfile name associated with L3redirectrule. Search is case insensitive.

                                                                                                                                                • edgeId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                  edgeId is the EdgeID, that displays rules applicable to the specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                • action: (string)

                                                                                                                                                  Filter for specific action (allow, deny)

                                                                                                                                                put /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config

                                                                                                                                                This will update the complete firewall configuration in all sections. You will need to get the Etag value out of the GET (dfwConfigShow) first. Then pass the modified version of the whole firewall configuration in the GET body

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                Headers

                                                                                                                                                • if-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                                Body

                                                                                                                                                Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                delete /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config

                                                                                                                                                Restores default configuration, which means one defaultLayer3 section with default allow rule and one defaultLayer2Section with default allow rule

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections get post

                                                                                                                                                  L3 Firewall Operations on specific section specified by name (in a query Parameter)

                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                  Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by name

                                                                                                                                                  post

                                                                                                                                                  Creates a new L3 Firewall Section with a number of rules

                                                                                                                                                  get /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections

                                                                                                                                                  Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by name

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • name: (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Name of the Section to read

                                                                                                                                                  post /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections

                                                                                                                                                  Creates a new L3 Firewall Section with a number of rules

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                                                  <section name="">
    <rule disabled="" logged="">
        <name></name>
        <action></action>
        <appliedToList>
            <appliedTo>
                <name></name>
                <value></value>
                <type></type>
                <isValid></isValid>
            </appliedTo>
        </appliedToList>
        <sources excluded="">
            <source>
                <name></name>
                <value></value>
                <type></type>
                <isValid></iValid>
            </source>
        </sources>
        <destinations excluded="">
            <destination>
                <name></name>
                <value></value>
                <type></type>
                <isValid></isValid>
            </destination>
        </destinations>
        <services>
            <service>
                <destinationPort></destinationPort>
                <protocol></protocol>
                <subProtocol></subProtocol>
            </service>
        </services>
    </rule>
    <rule disabled="" logged="">
       <name></name>>
       <action></action>
    </rule>
</section>

                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                  L3 Firewall Operations on specific section specified by section ID

                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                  Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by Id

                                                                                                                                                  put

                                                                                                                                                  Updates a L3 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

                                                                                                                                                  delete

                                                                                                                                                  Deletes a L3 section and its content by ID

                                                                                                                                                  get /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}

                                                                                                                                                  Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by Id

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  put /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}

                                                                                                                                                  Updates a L3 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  Headers

                                                                                                                                                  • If-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  delete /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}

                                                                                                                                                  Deletes a L3 section and its content by ID

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}/rules post

                                                                                                                                                  Operations to add one or more L3 Rules

                                                                                                                                                  post

                                                                                                                                                  Add a L3 Rule

                                                                                                                                                  post /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}/rules

                                                                                                                                                  Add a L3 Rule

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  Headers

                                                                                                                                                  • If-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                                                  <rule disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <notes></notes>
    <appliedToList>
        <appliedTo>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
        </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sources excluded="">
        <source>
            <name></name>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
            <isValid></isValid>
        </source>
    </sources>
    <destinations excluded="">
        <destination>
            <name></name>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
            <isValid></isValid>
        </destination>
    </destinations>
    <services>
        <service>
            <value></value>
        </service>
    </services>
</rule>

                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                  Operations on L3 rules in sections identified by section Id and Rule Id

                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                  Read the configuration of a specific rule identified by rule Id

                                                                                                                                                  put

                                                                                                                                                  Updates a L3 DFW Rule. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

                                                                                                                                                  delete

                                                                                                                                                  Delete a specific rule identified by rule Id

                                                                                                                                                  get /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

                                                                                                                                                  Read the configuration of a specific rule identified by rule Id

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  • ruleId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  put /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

                                                                                                                                                  Updates a L3 DFW Rule. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  • ruleId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  Headers

                                                                                                                                                  • If-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  delete /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

                                                                                                                                                  Delete a specific rule identified by rule Id

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  • ruleId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  Headers

                                                                                                                                                  • If-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionName} put

                                                                                                                                                  L3 Firewall Update Operations on specific section specified by section Name

                                                                                                                                                  put

                                                                                                                                                  Updates a L3 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

                                                                                                                                                  put /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionName}

                                                                                                                                                  Updates a L3 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionName: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  Headers

                                                                                                                                                  • If-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections get post

                                                                                                                                                  L2 Firewall Operations on specific section specified by name (in a query Parameter)

                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                  Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by name

                                                                                                                                                  post

                                                                                                                                                  Creates a new L2 Firewall Section with a number of rules

                                                                                                                                                  get /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections

                                                                                                                                                  Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by name

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • name: (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Name of the Section to read

                                                                                                                                                  post /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections

                                                                                                                                                  Creates a new L2 Firewall Section with a number of rules

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                                                  <section name="">
    <rule disabled="" logged="">
        <name></name>
        <action></action>
        <appliedToList>
            <appliedTo>
                <name></name>
                <value></value>
                <type></type>
                <isValid></isValid>
            </appliedTo>
        </appliedToList>
        <sources excluded="">
            <source>
                <name></name>
                <value></value>
                <type></type>
                <isValid></iValid>
            </source>
        </sources>
        <destinations excluded="">
            <destination>
                <name></name>
                <value></value>
                <type></type>
                <isValid></isValid>
            </destination>
        </destinations>
        <services>
            <service>
                <destinationPort></destinationPort>
                <protocol></protocol>
                <subProtocol></subProtocol>
            </service>
        </services>
    </rule>
    <rule disabled="" logged="">
       <name></name>>
       <action></action>
    </rule>
</section>

                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                  L2 Firewall Operations on specific section specified by section ID

                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                  Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by Id

                                                                                                                                                  put

                                                                                                                                                  Updates a L2 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

                                                                                                                                                  delete

                                                                                                                                                  Deletes a L2 section and its content by ID

                                                                                                                                                  get /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}

                                                                                                                                                  Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by Id

                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  put /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}

                                                                                                                                                  Updates a L2 DFW Section.                                                                                                                                                   Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters
