                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}/rules post

                                                                                                                                                  Operations to add one or more L2 Rules

                                                                                                                                                  post

                                                                                                                                                  Add L2 Rule

                                                                                                                                                  post /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}/rules

                                                                                                                                                  Add L2 Rule

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  Headers

                                                                                                                                                  • If-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                                                  <rule disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <notes></notes>
    <appliedToList>
        <appliedTo>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
        </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sources excluded="">
        <source>
            <name></name>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
            <isValid></isValid>
        </source>
    </sources>
    <destinations excluded="">
        <destination>
            <name></name>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
            <isValid></isValid>
        </destination>
    </destinations>
    <services>
        <service>
            <value></value>
        </service>
    </services>
</rule>

                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                  Operations on L2 rules in sections identified by section Id and Rule Id

                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                  Read the configuration of a specific rule identified by rule Id

                                                                                                                                                  put

                                                                                                                                                  Updates a L2 DFW Rule. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

                                                                                                                                                  delete

                                                                                                                                                  Delete a specific rule identified by rule Id

                                                                                                                                                  get /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

                                                                                                                                                  Read the configuration of a specific rule identified by rule Id

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  • ruleId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  put /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

                                                                                                                                                  Updates a L2 DFW Rule. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  • ruleId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  Headers

                                                                                                                                                  • If-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  delete /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

                                                                                                                                                  Delete a specific rule identified by rule Id

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  • ruleId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

                                                                                                                                                  Headers

                                                                                                                                                  • If-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionName} put

                                                                                                                                                  L3 Firewall Update Operations on specific section specified by section Name

                                                                                                                                                  put

                                                                                                                                                  Updates a L2 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

                                                                                                                                                  put /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionName}

                                                                                                                                                  Updates a L2 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • sectionName: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                  Headers

                                                                                                                                                  • If-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections post

                                                                                                                                                  Layer3 redirect sections and rules

                                                                                                                                                  post

                                                                                                                                                  Add L3 redirect section

                                                                                                                                                  post /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections

                                                                                                                                                  Add L3 redirect section

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                                                  <section>
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
        <appliedTo>
            <name></name>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
            <isValid></isValid>
        </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
</section>

                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                  Layer3 redirect section

                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                  Get L3 redirect section configuration

                                                                                                                                                  put

                                                                                                                                                  Modify L3 Redirect section. You will need to get the Etag value out of the GET first. Then pass the modified version of the whole redirect section configuration in the GET body

                                                                                                                                                  delete

                                                                                                                                                  Delete specified L3 redirect section

                                                                                                                                                  get /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}

                                                                                                                                                  Get L3 redirect section configuration

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                                  put /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}

                                                                                                                                                  Modify L3 Redirect section. You will need to get the Etag value out of the GET first. Then pass the modified version of the whole redirect section configuration in the GET body

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                                  Headers

                                                                                                                                                  • if-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                                                  <section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
    <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
        <name></name>
        <action></action>
        <appliedToList>
            <appliedTo>
                <name></name>
                <value></value>
                <type></type>
                <isValid></isValid>
            </appliedTo>
        </appliedToList>
        <sectionId></sectionId>
    </rule>
</section>

                                                                                                                                                  delete /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}

                                                                                                                                                  • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                                  post /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                                                  <section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
        <appliedTo>
            <name></name>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
            <isValid></isValid>
        </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
</section>

                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules/{ruleID} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                  Rule for specified section

                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                  Get L3 redirect rule

                                                                                                                                                  put

                                                                                                                                                  Modify L3 redirect rule. You will need Etag value from the response header of GET call. Then, pass Etag value as the if-match header in PUT call

                                                                                                                                                  delete

                                                                                                                                                  Delete specified L3 redirect rule

                                                                                                                                                  get /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules/{ruleID}

                                                                                                                                                  Get L3 redirect rule

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                                  • ruleID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Specified redirect rule

                                                                                                                                                  put /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules/{ruleID}

                                                                                                                                                  Modify L3 redirect rule. You will need Etag value from the response header of GET call. Then, pass Etag value as the if-match header in PUT call

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                                  • ruleID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Specified redirect rule

                                                                                                                                                  Headers

                                                                                                                                                  • if-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                                                  <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
        <appliedTo>
            <name></name>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
            <isValid></isValid>
        </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
</rule>

                                                                                                                                                  delete /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules/{ruleID}

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                  • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                    Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                                  • ruleID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                          /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts post get

                                                                                                                                                          Import and export firewall configurations

                                                                                                                                                          post

                                                                                                                                                          Save a firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                                                                          Displays the draft IDs of all saved configurations

                                                                                                                                                          post /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts

                                                                                                                                                          Save a firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                                          Body

                                                                                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                          Schema:

                                                                                                                                                          <firewallDraft name="">
    <description></description>
    <preserve></preserve>
    <mode></mode>
    <config>
        <contextId></contextId>
        <layer3Sections>
            <section name="" >
                <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
                    <name></name>
                    <action></action>
                    <precedence></precedence>
                </rule>
            </section>
        </layer3Sections>
        <layer2Sections>
            <section name="">
                <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
                    <name></name>
                    <action></action>
                    <precedence></precedence>
                </rule>
            </section>
        </layer2Sections>
    </config>
</firewallDraft>

                                                                                                                                                          get /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts

                                                                                                                                                          Displays the draft IDs of all saved configurations

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                            /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                            Specified saved firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                            get

                                                                                                                                                            Get a saved firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                            put

                                                                                                                                                            Update a saved firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                            delete

                                                                                                                                                            Delete a configuration

                                                                                                                                                            get /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}

                                                                                                                                                            Get a saved firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                            Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                            • Request

                                                                                                                                                            URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                            • draftID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                              Specified draft ID (retrieved through dfwDrafts GET call)

                                                                                                                                                            put /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}

                                                                                                                                                            Update a saved firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                            Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                            • Request

                                                                                                                                                            URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                            • draftID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                              Specified draft ID (retrieved through dfwDrafts GET call)

                                                                                                                                                            Body

                                                                                                                                                            Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                            Schema:

                                                                                                                                                            <firewallDraft name="">
    <description></description>
    <preserve></preserve>
    <mode></mode>
    <config>
        <contextId></contextId>
        <layer3Sections>
            <section name="" >
                <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
                    <name></name>
                    <action></action>
                    <precedence></precedence>
                </rule>
            </section>
        </layer3Sections>
        <layer2Sections>
            <section name="">
                <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
                    <name></name>
                    <action></action>
                    <precedence></precedence>
                </rule>
            </section>
        </layer2Sections>
    </config>
</firewallDraft>

                                                                                                                                                            /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}/action/import post

                                                                                                                                                            Import a configuration

                                                                                                                                                            post

                                                                                                                                                            Import a configuration

                                                                                                                                                            post /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}/action/import

                                                                                                                                                            Import a configuration

                                                                                                                                                            Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                            • Request

                                                                                                                                                            URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                            • draftID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                              Specified draft ID (retrieved through dfwDrafts GET call)

                                                                                                                                                            Body

                                                                                                                                                            Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                            Schema:

                                                                                                                                                            <firewallDraft id="" name="" timestamp="">
    <description></description>
    <preserve></preserve>
    <user></user>
    <mode></mode>
    <config timestamp="">
        <contextId></contextId>
        <layer3Sections>
            <section name="" timestamp="">
                <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
                    <name></name>
                    <action></action>
                    <precedence></precedence>
                </rule>
            </section>
        </layer3Sections>
        <layer2Sections>
            <section name="" timestamp="">
                <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
                    <name></name>
                    <action></action>
                    <precedence></precedence>
                </rule>
            </section>
        </layer2Sections>
        <generationNumber></generationNumber>
    </config>
</firewallDraft>

                                                                                                                                                            /4.0/firewall/stats/eventthresholds get put

                                                                                                                                                            Memory and CPU thresholds for firewall

                                                                                                                                                            get

                                                                                                                                                            Retrieve memory, CPU, and CPS thresholds for firewall

                                                                                                                                                            put

                                                                                                                                                            Configure thresholds

                                                                                                                                                            get /4.0/firewall/stats/eventthresholds

                                                                                                                                                            Retrieve memory, CPU, and CPS thresholds for firewall

                                                                                                                                                            Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                              put /4.0/firewall/stats/eventthresholds

                                                                                                                                                              Configure thresholds

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <eventThresholds>
    <cpu>
        <percentValue></percentValue>
    </cpu>
    <memory>
        <percentValue></percentValue>
    </memory>
    <connectionsPerSecond>
        <value></value>
    </connectionsPerSecond>
</eventThresholds>

                                                                                                                                                              /4.0/firewall/config/globalconfiguration get put

                                                                                                                                                              Tuning firewall performance

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Query RuleOptimize and TCPStrict flags

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Set RuleOptimize and TCPStrict flags in body to improve performance

                                                                                                                                                              get /4.0/firewall/config/globalconfiguration

                                                                                                                                                              Query RuleOptimize and TCPStrict flags

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                                put /4.0/firewall/config/globalconfiguration

                                                                                                                                                                Set RuleOptimize and TCPStrict flags in body to improve performance

                                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                                Body

                                                                                                                                                                Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                <globalConfiguration>
    <layer3RuleOptimize></layer3RuleOptimize>
    <layer2RuleOptimize></layer2RuleOptimize>
    <tcpStrictOption></tcpStrictOption>
</globalConfiguration>

                                                                                                                                                                /4.0/firewall/forceSync/{ID} post

                                                                                                                                                                post

                                                                                                                                                                post /4.0/firewall/forceSync/{ID}

                                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                /4.0/firewall/{domainID}/enable/{truefalse} post

                                                                                                                                                                post

                                                                                                                                                                Enable or disable firewall components on a cluster

                                                                                                                                                                post /4.0/firewall/{domainID}/enable/{truefalse}

                                                                                                                                                                Enable or disable firewall components on a cluster

                                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                • domainID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                  Specified cluster

                                                                                                                                                                • truefalse: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                  Set parameter to true/false to enable/disable

                                                                                                                                                                /4.0/firewall/{contextId}/config/ipfix get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                Export specific flows directly from firewall to a flow collector

                                                                                                                                                                get

                                                                                                                                                                Query IPFix configuration

                                                                                                                                                                put

                                                                                                                                                                Configure IPFix

                                                                                                                                                                delete

                                                                                                                                                                Deleting IPFix configuration resets the config to default values

                                                                                                                                                                get /4.0/firewall/{contextId}/config/ipfix

                                                                                                                                                                Query IPFix configuration

                                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                • contextId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                  Specified context

                                                                                                                                                                put /4.0/firewall/{contextId}/config/ipfix

                                                                                                                                                                Configure IPFix

                                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                • contextId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                  Specified context

                                                                                                                                                                Body

                                                                                                                                                                Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                <ipfixConfiguration>
    <contextId></contextId>
    <ipfixEnabled></ipfixEnabled>
    <observationDomainId></observationDomainId>
    <flowTimeout></flowTimeout>
    <collector>
        <ip></ip>
        <port></port>
    </collector>
</ipfixConfiguration>

                                                                                                                                                                delete /4.0/firewall/{contextId}/config/ipfix

                                                                                                                                                                Deleting IPFix configuration resets the config to default values

                                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                • contextId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                  Specified context

                                                                                                                                                                spoofGuardPolicies

                                                                                                                                                                SpoofGuard policies

                                                                                                                                                                /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies post get

                                                                                                                                                                post

                                                                                                                                                                Create a SpoofGuard policy to specify the operation mode for networks.

                                                                                                                                                                get

                                                                                                                                                                Retrieve all SpoofGuard policies

                                                                                                                                                                post /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies

                                                                                                                                                                Create a SpoofGuard policy to specify the operation mode for networks.

                                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                                Body

                                                                                                                                                                Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                <spoofguardPolicy>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <operationMode></operationMode>
    <enforcementPoint>
        <id></id>
        <name></name>
        <type></type>
    </enforcementPoint>
    <allowLocalIPs></allowLocalIPs>
</spoofguardPolicy>

                                                                                                                                                                get /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies

                                                                                                                                                                Retrieve all SpoofGuard policies

                                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                                  /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID} post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                  Specified policy

                                                                                                                                                                  post

                                                                                                                                                                  Use query parameters to perform operations on a policy

                                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve policy information, or use the query parameters to perform operations

                                                                                                                                                                  put

                                                                                                                                                                  Modify SpoofGuard policy

                                                                                                                                                                  delete

                                                                                                                                                                  Delete a policy

                                                                                                                                                                  post /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID}

                                                                                                                                                                  Use query parameters to perform operations on a policy

                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                  • policyID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                  • action: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    set to "approve" along with specified IP addresses in body to approve them, or set to "publish" to publish the approved IP addresses

                                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                  <spoofguardList>
    <spoofguard>
        <id></id>
        <vnicUuid></vnicUuid>
        <approvedIpAddress>
            <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        </approvedIpAddress>
        <approvedMacAddress></approvedMacAddress>
        <approvedBy></approvedBy>
        <approvedOn></approvedOn>
        <publishedIpAddress>
            <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        </publishedIpAddress>
        <publishedMacAddress></publishedMacAddress>
        <publishedBy></publishedBy>
        <publishedOn></publishedOn>
    </spoofguard>
</spoofguardList>

                                                                                                                                                                  get /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID}

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve policy information, or use the query parameters to perform operations

                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                  • policyID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                  • list: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Use to retrieve IP addresses for specified state (ACTIVE|INACTIVE|PUBLISHED|UNPUBLISHED|REVIEW_PENDING|DUPLICATE)

                                                                                                                                                                  put /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID}

                                                                                                                                                                  Modify SpoofGuard policy

                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                  • policyID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                  <spoofguardPolicy>
    <policyId></policyId>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <operationMode></operationMode>
    <enforcementPoint>
        <id></id>
        <name></name>
        <type></type>
    </enforcementPoint>
    <allowLocalIPs></allowLocalIPs>
</spoofguardPolicy>

                                                                                                                                                                  delete /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID}

                                                                                                                                                                  Delete a policy

                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                  • policyID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                  flowStats

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow statistics for a datacenter, port group, VM, or vNIC

                                                                                                                                                                  /2.1/flow/flowstats get

                                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow statistics for a datacenter, port group, VM, or vNIC

                                                                                                                                                                  get /2.1/flow/flowstats

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow statistics for a datacenter, port group, VM, or vNIC

                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                  • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    vc-moref-id of the datacenter, portgroup, vm, or UUID of the vNIC for which traffic flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                                  • flowType: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Type of flow to be retrieved (TCP_UDP|LAYER2|LAYER3)

                                                                                                                                                                  • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with start time greater than specified time are retrieved
