                                                                                                                                                                  • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with start time lower than specified time are retrieved

                                                                                                                                                                  • startIndex: (integer)

                                                                                                                                                                    (optional) Specifies starting point for retrieval. If not specified, start from the beginning by default

                                                                                                                                                                  • pageSize: (integer - default: 256)

                                                                                                                                                                    (optional) Limit the max number of entries returned. Valid range is 1-1024

                                                                                                                                                                  flowData

                                                                                                                                                                  Operations on flowdata

                                                                                                                                                                  /2.1/internal/flow/flowsummary get

                                                                                                                                                                  Flow summary for given context

                                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow summary

                                                                                                                                                                  get /2.1/internal/flow/flowsummary

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow summary

                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                  • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    vc-moref-id of datacenter, port group, vm, or uuid of vNIC for which flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                                  • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with start time greater than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                                  • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with end time lesser than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                                  /2.1/internal/flow/flowtable get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow table for given context and table type

                                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow table for given context and table type

                                                                                                                                                                  get /2.1/internal/flow/flowtable

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow table for given context and table type

                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                  • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    vc-moref-id of datacenter, port group, vm, or uuid of vNIC for which flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                                  • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with start time greater than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                                  • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with end time lesser than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                                  • tableType: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Type of flow to be fetched (source|application|destination)

                                                                                                                                                                  • maxRows: (string - default: 5)

                                                                                                                                                                    (optional) Max number of rows to return

                                                                                                                                                                  /2.1/internal/flow/flowdetails get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow details for given context

                                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow details for given context

                                                                                                                                                                  get /2.1/internal/flow/flowdetails

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow details for given context

                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                  • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    vc-moref-id of datacenter, port group, vm, or uuid of vNIC for which flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                                  • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with start time greater than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                                  • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with end time lesser than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                                  • flowType: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Type of flow to be fetched (Allowed|Blocked)

                                                                                                                                                                  /2.1/internal/flow/flowdetails/application get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow details for given context by application

                                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow details for given context by application

                                                                                                                                                                  get /2.1/internal/flow/flowdetails/application

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve flow details for given context by application

                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                  • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    vc-moref-id of datacenter, port group, vm, or uuid of vNIC for which flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                                  • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with start time greater than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                                  • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with end time lesser than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                                  • flowType: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Type of flow to be fetched (Allowed|Blocked)

                                                                                                                                                                  • serviceId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Service identifier of application to be queried

                                                                                                                                                                  /2.1/internal/flow/pagedflowdetails get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieves paged flow details for given context

                                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieves paged flow details for given context

                                                                                                                                                                  get /2.1/internal/flow/pagedflowdetails

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieves paged flow details for given context

                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                  • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    vc-moref-id of datacenter, port group, vm, or uuid of vNIC for which flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                                  • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with start time greater than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                                  • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with end time lesser than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                                  • flowType: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Type of flow to be fetched (Allowed|Blocked)

                                                                                                                                                                  • startIndex: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    (optional) Start index for returned flows

                                                                                                                                                                  • pageSize: (string - default: 256)

                                                                                                                                                                    (optional) Max number of flows to return in a single call

                                                                                                                                                                  /2.1/internal/flow/pagedflowdetails/application get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve paged flow details by application

                                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve paged flow details by application

                                                                                                                                                                  get /2.1/internal/flow/pagedflowdetails/application

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve paged flow details by application

                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                  • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    vc-moref-id of datacenter, port group, vm, or uuid of vNIC for which flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                                  • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with start time greater than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                                  • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Flows with end time lesser than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                                  • flowType: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Type of flow to be fetched (Allowed|Blocked)

                                                                                                                                                                  • startIndex: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    (optional) Start index for returned flows

                                                                                                                                                                  • pageSize: (string - default: 256)

                                                                                                                                                                    (optional) Max number of flows to return in a single call

                                                                                                                                                                  • serviceId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                    Service identifier of application to query

                                                                                                                                                                  /2.1/internal/flow/config post get

                                                                                                                                                                  Exclude specified flows

                                                                                                                                                                  post

                                                                                                                                                                  Exclude specified flows

                                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve excluded flow details

                                                                                                                                                                  post /2.1/internal/flow/config

                                                                                                                                                                  Exclude specified flows

                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                  <FlowConfiguration>
    <collectFlows>true|false</collectFlows>
    <ignoreBlockedFlows>true|false</ignoreBlockedFlows>
    <ignoreLayer2Flows>true|false</ignoreLayer2Flows>
    <sourceIPs>mandatory</sourceIPs>
    <sourceContainer>
        <name>mandatory</name>
        <id>mandatory</id>
        <type>mandatory</type>
    </sourceContainer>
    <destinationIPs>mandatory</destinationIPs>
    <destinationContainer>
        <name>mandatory</name>
        <id>mandatory</id>
        <type>mandatory</type>
    </destinationContainer>
    <destinationPorts>mandatory</destinationPorts>
    <service>
        <name>mandatory</name>
        <id>mandatory</id>
    </service>
</FlowConfiguration>

                                                                                                                                                                  get /2.1/internal/flow/config

                                                                                                                                                                  Retrieve excluded flow details

                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                                    dfwExclusion

                                                                                                                                                                    Exclude VM's from firewall protection

                                                                                                                                                                    /2.1/app/excludelist get

                                                                                                                                                                    get

                                                                                                                                                                    Retrieve the set of vm's in the exclusion list

                                                                                                                                                                    get /2.1/app/excludelist

                                                                                                                                                                    Retrieve the set of vm's in the exclusion list

                                                                                                                                                                    Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.1/app/excludelist/{memberID} put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Exclude VM's from firewall protection

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Add a vm to the exclusion list

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete a vm from exclusion list

                                                                                                                                                                      put /2.1/app/excludelist/{memberID}

                                                                                                                                                                      Add a vm to the exclusion list

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • memberID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        vc-moref-id of a virtual machine

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /2.1/app/excludelist/{memberID}

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete a vm from exclusion list

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • memberID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        vc-moref-id of a virtual machine

                                                                                                                                                                      nsxEdges

                                                                                                                                                                      Installed NSX Edges in your inventory

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges post get

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Install NSX Edge services gateway or logical router, depending on request body

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve a list of NSX Edges in your inventory or use the query parameters to filter results by datacenter or port group

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges

                                                                                                                                                                      Install NSX Edge services gateway or logical router, depending on request body

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <edge>
    <datacenterMoid></datacenterMoid>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <tenant></tenant>
    <fqdn></fqdn>
    <vseLogLevel></vseLogLevel>
    <enableAesni></enableAesni>
    <enableFips></enableFips>
    <appliances>
        <applianceSize></applianceSize>
        <enableCoreDump></enableCoreDump>
        <appliance>
            <resourcePoolId></resourcePoolId>
            <datastoreId></datastoreId>
            <hostId></hostId>
            <vmFolderId></vmFolderId>
            <customField>
                <key></key>
                <value></value>
            </customField>
            <cpuReservation>
                <limit></limit>
                <reservation></reservation>
                <shares></shares>
            </cpuReservation>
            <memoryReservation>
                <limit></limit>
                <reservation></reservation>
                <shares></shares>
            </memoryReservation>
        </appliance>
    </appliances>
    <vnics> 
        <vnic>
            <index></index>
            <name></name>
            <type></type>
            <portgroupId></portgroupId>
            <addressGroups>
                <addressGroup>
                    <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
                    <secondaryAddresses>
                        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
                    </secondaryAddresses>
                    <subnetMask></subnetMask>
                </addressGroup>
            </addressGroups>
            <macAddress>
                <edgeVmHaIndex></edgeVmHaIndex>
                <value></value>
            </macAddress>
            <fenceParameter>
                <key></key>
                <value></value>
            </fenceParameter>
            <mtu></mtu>
            <enableProxyArp></enableProxyArp>
            <enableSendRedirects></enableSendRedirects>
            <isConnected></isConnected>
            <inShapingPolicy>
                <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
                <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
                <burstSize></burstSize>
                <enabled></enabled>
                <inherited></inherited>
            </inShapingPolicy>
            <outShapingPolicy>
                <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
                <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
                <burstSize></burstSize>
                <enabled></enabled>
                <inherited></inherited>
            </outShapingPolicy>
        </vnic>
    </vnics>
    <cliSettings>
        <userName></userName>
        <password></password>
        <remoteAccess></remoteAccess>
    </cliSettings>
    <autoConfiguration>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <rulePriority></rulePriority>
    </autoConfiguration>
    <dnsClient>
        <primaryDns></primaryDns>
        <secondaryDns></secondaryDns>
        <domainName></domainName>
    </dnsClient>
    <queryDaemon>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <port></port>
    </queryDaemon>
</edge>

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve a list of NSX Edges in your inventory or use the query parameters to filter results by datacenter or port group

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • datacenter: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Retrieve Edges by datacenter MoId

                                                                                                                                                                      • tenant: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Retrieve Edges on specified tenant (by tenant ID)

                                                                                                                                                                      • pg: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Retrieve Edges with one interface on specified port group (by port group MoId)

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId} post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      NSX Edge operations

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Manage NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve Edge details

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Update the NSX Edge configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete specified Edge from database. Associated appliances are also deleted

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Manage NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • action: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Options include "forcesync" (resync Edge vm's), "redeploy" ()

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve Edge details

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Update the NSX Edge configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <edge>
    <id></id>
    <description></description>
    <datacenterMoid></datacenterMoid>
    <name></name>
    <fqdn></fqdn>
    <enableAesni></enableAesni>
    <enableFips></enableFips>
    <vseLogLevel></vseLogLevel>
    <vnics>
        <vnic>
            <index></index>
            <name></name>
            <type></type>
            <portgroupId></portgroupId>
            <addressGroups>
                <addressGroup>
                    <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
                    <secondaryAddresses>
                        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
                    </secondaryAddresses>
                    <subnetMask></subnetMask>
                </addressGroup>
            <addressGroup>
            <mtu></mtu>
            <enableProxyArp></enableProxyArp>
            <enableSendRedirects></enableSendRedirects>
            <isConnected></isConnected>
            <inShapingPolicy>
                <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
                <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
                <burstSize></burstSize>
                <enabled></enabled>
                <inherited></inherited>
            </inShapingPolicy>
            <outShapingPolicy>
                <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
                <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
                <burstSize></burstSize>
                <enabled></enabled>
                <inherited></inherited>
            </outShapingPolicy>
        </vnic>
    </vnics>
    <appliances>
        <applianceSize></applianceSize>
        <appliance>
            <resourcePoolId></resourcePoolId>
            <datastoreId></datastoreId>
            <vmFolderId></vmFolderId>
        </appliance>
    </appliances>
    <cliSettings>
        <remoteAccess></remoteAccess>
        <userName></userName>
    </cliSettings>
    <features>
        <firewall>
            <defaultPolicy>
                <action></action>
                <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
            </defaultPolicy>
            <rules>
                <rule>
                    <id></id>
                    <ruleTag></ruleTag>
                    <name></name>
                    <ruleType></ruleType>
                    <source>
                        <exclude></exclude>
                        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                    </source>
                    <destination><destination/>
                    <application>
                        <applicationId></applicationId>
                    </application>
                    <action></action>
                    <enabled></enabled>
                    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
                    <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
                </rule>
            </rules>
        </firewall>
        <routing>
            <staticRouting>
                <defaultRoute>
                    <vnic></vnic>
                    <gatewayAddress></gatewayAddress>
                    <description></description>
                </defaultRoute>
                <staticRoutes>
                    <route>
                        <vnic></vnic>
                        <network></network>
                        <nextHop></nextHop>
                        <type></type>
                    </route>
                </staticRoutes>
            </staticRouting>
            <ospf>
                <enabled></enabled>
            </ospf>
        </routing>
        <highAvailability>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <declareDeadTime></declareDeadTime>
            <logging>
                <enable></enable>
                <logLevel></logLevel>
            </logging>
        </highAvailability>
        <syslog>
            <protocol></protocol>
            <serverAddresses>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            </serverAddresses>
        </syslog>
        <ipsec>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <logging>
                <enable></enable>
                <logLevel></logLevel>
            </logging>
            <sites>
                <site>
                    <enabled></enabled>
                    <name></name>
                    <localId></localId>
                    <localIp></localIp>
                    <peerId></peerId>
                    <encryptionAlgorithm></encryptionAlgorithm>
                    <mtu></mtu>
                    <enablePfs></enablePfs>
                    <dhGroup></dhGroup>
                    <localSubnets>
                        <subnet></subnet>
                    </localSubnets>
                    <peerSubnets>
                        <subnet></subnet>
                    </peerSubnets>
                    <psk></psk>
                    <authenticationMode></authenticationMode>
                </site>
            </sites>
            <global>
                <caCertificates/>
                <crlCertificates/>
            </global>
        </ipsec>
        <dhcp>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <staticBindings>
                <staticBinding>
                    <autoConfigureDNS></autoConfigureDNS>
                    <bindingId></bindingId>
                    <vmId></vmId>
                    <vnicId></vnicId>
                    <hostname></hostname>
                    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
                    <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
                    <leaseTime></leaseTime>
                </staticBinding>
            </staticBindings>
            <ipPools>
                <ipPool>
                    <autoConfigureDNS></autoConfigureDNS>
                    <poolId></poolId>
                    <ipRange></ipRange>
                    <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
                    <leaseTime></leaseTime>
                </ipPool>
            </ipPools>
            <logging>
                <enable></enable>
                <logLevel></logLevel>
            </logging>
        </dhcp>
        <nat>
            <natRules>
                <natRule>
                    <ruleId></ruleId>
                    <ruleTag></ruleTag>
                    <ruleType></ruleType>
                    <action></action>
                    <vnic></vnic>
                    <originalAddress></originalAddress>
                    <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
                    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
                    <enabled></enabled>
                    <protocol></protocol>
                    <originalPort></originalPort>
                    <translatedPort></translatedPort>
                </natRule>
            </natRules>
        </nat>
    </features>
    <autoConfiguration>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <rulePriority></rulePriority>
    </autoConfiguration>
</edge>

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete specified Edge from database. Associated appliances are also deleted

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dnsclient put

                                                                                                                                                                      DNS settings (primary/secondary and search domain) of an Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Update Edge DNS settings

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dnsclient

                                                                                                                                                                      Update Edge DNS settings

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <dns>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <dnsServers>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </dnsServers>
    <cacheSize></cacheSize>
    <listeners>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </listeners>
    <logging>
        <logLevel></logLevel>
        <enable></enable>
    </logging>
</dns>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/aesni post

                                                                                                                                                                      AESNI Setting

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify AESNI setting

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/aesni

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify AESNI setting

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • enable: required (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/coredump post

                                                                                                                                                                      Enabling core-dump feature results in deployment of inbuilt extra disk to save core-dump files. 1GB for compact edge and 8GB for other types. Disabling detaches the disk

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify core dump setting

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/coredump

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify core dump setting

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/fips post

                                                                                                                                                                      FIPs setting

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify FIPs setting

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/fips

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify FIPs setting

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • enable: required (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/logging post

                                                                                                                                                                      Log setting

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify log setting

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/logging

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify log setting

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • level: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/summary get

                                                                                                                                                                      Edge summary

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve details about the specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/summary

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve details about the specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/status get

                                                                                                                                                                      Edge status

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve the status of the specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/status

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve the status of the specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • getlatest: (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                        true = fetch the status live from NSX Edge, false = fetch the latest available status from database

                                                                                                                                                                      • detailed: (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                        true = fetch detailed status per feature, false = aggregated summary of status per feature

                                                                                                                                                                      • preRulesStatus: (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                        true = fetch detailed output for pre rules in addition to the regular output

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/techsupportlogs get

                                                                                                                                                                      Tech support logs for specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve the tech support logs for Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/techsupportlogs

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve the tech support logs for Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/clisettings put

                                                                                                                                                                      Manage CLI credentials and access

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify CLI credentials and enable/disable SSH for Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/clisettings

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify CLI credentials and enable/disable SSH for Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml
