                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <cliSettings>
    <userName></userName>
    <password></password>
    <remoteAccess></remoteAccess>
    <passwordExpiry></passwordExpiry>
    <sshLoginBannerText></sshLoginBanerText>
</cliSettings>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/cliremoteaccess post

                                                                                                                                                                      Enable or disable SSH on the Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Change CLI remote access

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/cliremoteaccess

                                                                                                                                                                      Change CLI remote access

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • enable: required (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure firewall for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Read the firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure firewall for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Read the firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure firewall for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <firewall>
    <defaultPolicy>
        <action></action>
        <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
    </defaultPolicy>
    <globalConfig>
        <tcpPickOngoingConnections></tcpPickOngoingConnections>
        <tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets></tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets>
        <tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts></tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts>
        <dropInvalidTraffic></dropInvalidTraffic>
        <logInvalidTraffic></logInvalidTraffic>
        <tcpTimeoutOpen></tcpTimeoutOpen>
        <tcpTimeoutEstablished></tcpTimeoutEstablished>
        <tcpTimeoutClose></tcpTimeoutClose>
        <udpTimeout></udpTimeout>
        <icmpTimeout></icmpTimeout>
        <icmp6Timeout></icmp6Timeout>
        <ipGenericTimeout></ipGenericTimeout>
    </globalConfig>
    <rules>
        <rule>
            <ruleTag></ruleTag>
            <name></name>
            <source>
                <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
                <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            </source>
            <destination>
                <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId> 
                <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            </destination>
            <application>
                <applicationId></applicationId>
                <service>
                    <protocol></protocol>
                    <port></port>
                    <sourcePort></sourcePort>
                </service>
            </application>
            <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
            <direction></direction>
            <action></action>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
            <description></description>
        </rule>
    </rules>
</firewall>

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules post

                                                                                                                                                                      Firewall rules

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Add one or more rules. You can add a rule above a specific rule using the query parameter, indicating the desired ruleID.

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules

                                                                                                                                                                      Add one or more rules. You can add a rule above a specific rule using the query parameter, indicating the desired ruleID.

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • aboveRuleId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        rule Id

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <firewall>
    <defaultPolicy>
        <action></action>
        <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
    </defaultPolicy>
    <globalConfig>
        <tcpPickOngoingConnections></tcpPickOngoingConnections>
        <tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets></tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets>
        <tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts></tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts>
        <dropInvalidTraffic></dropInvalidTraffic>
        <logInvalidTraffic></logInvalidTraffic>
        <tcpTimeoutOpen></tcpTimeoutOpen>
        <tcpTimeoutEstablished></tcpTimeoutEstablished>
        <tcpTimeoutClose></tcpTimeoutClose>
        <udpTimeout></udpTimeout>
        <icmpTimeout></icmpTimeout>
        <icmp6Timeout></icmp6Timeout>
        <ipGenericTimeout></ipGenericTimeout>
    </globalConfig>
    <rules>
        <rule>
            <ruleTag></ruleTag>
            <name></name>
            <source>
                <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
                <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            </source>
            <destination>
                <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
                <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            </destination>
            <application>
                <applicationId></applicationId>
                <service>
                    <protocol></protocol>
                    <port></port>
                    <sourcePort></sourcePort>
                </service>
            </application>
            <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
            <direction></direction>
            <action></action>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
            <description></description>
        </rule>
    </rules>
</firewall>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Specific firewall rule

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve specific rule

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify a specific firewall rule

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete firewall rule

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      • ruleId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Rule ID

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify a specific firewall rule

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      • ruleId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Rule ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <rule>
    <ruleTag></ruleTag>
    <name></name>
    <source>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
    </source>
    <destination>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
    </destination>
    <application>
        <applicationId></applicationId>
    </application>
    <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
    <direction></direction>
    <action></action>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
    <description></description>
</rule>

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId}

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/statistics/firewall get

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/statistics/firewall

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve number of ongoing connections for the firewall config

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • interval: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        60 min by default, can be given as 1 -60 min, oneDay | oneWeek | oneMonth | oneYear

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config put get delete

                                                                                                                                                                      SNAT and DNAT rules for NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Query SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete all NAT rules for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <nat>
    <natRules>
        <natRule>
            <ruleTag></ruleTag>
            <action></action>
            <vnic></vnic>
            <originalAddress></originalAddress>
            <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
            <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <description></description>
            <protocol></protocol>
            <translatedPort></translatedPort>
            <originalPort></originalPort>
        </natRule>
    </natRules>
</nat>

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Query SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete all NAT rules for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules post

                                                                                                                                                                      NAT rules

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Add a NAT rule above a specific rule in the NAT rules table (using aboveRuleId) or append NAT rules to the bottom

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules

                                                                                                                                                                      Add a NAT rule above a specific rule in the NAT rules table (using aboveRuleId) or append NAT rules to the bottom

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • aboveRuleId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified rule ID. If the ID does not exist, Edge Manager displays an error

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <natRules>
    <natRule>
        <action></action>
        <vnic></vnic>
        <originalAddress></originalAddress>
        <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
        <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <description></description>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <translatedPort></translatedPort>
        <originalPort></originalPort>
    </natRule>
</natRules>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules/{ruleID} put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Specified NAT rule

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify a NAT rule

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete a NAT rule

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules/{ruleID}

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify a NAT rule

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      • ruleID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified rule ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <natRule>
    <action></action>
    <vnic></vnic>
    <originalAddress></originalAddress>
    <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <description></description>
    <protocol></protocol>
    <translatedPort></translatedPort>
    <originalPort></originalPort>
</natRule>

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules/{ruleID}

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete a NAT rule

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      • ruleID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified rule ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Static and dynamic routing for each NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve routes

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure globalConfig, staticRouting, OSPG, BGP, and IS-IS

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete the routing config stored in the NSX Mgr database and the default routes from the specified NSX Edge appliance

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve routes

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure globalConfig, staticRouting, OSPG, BGP, and IS-IS

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <routing>
    <routingGlobalConfig>
        <ecmp></ecmp>
        <routerId></routerId>
        <logging>
            <enable></enable>
            <logLevel></logLevel>
        </logging>
        <ipPrefixes>
            <ipPrefix>
                <name></name>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            </ipPrefix>
        </ipPrefixes>
    </routingGlobalConfig>
    <staticRouting>
        <staticRoutes>
            <route>
                <description></description>
                <vnic></vnic>
                <network></network>
                <nextHop></nextHop>
                <mtu></mtu>
            </route>
        </staticRoutes>
        <defaultRoute>
            <description></description>
            <vnic></vnic>
            <gatewayAddress></gatewayAddress>
            <mtu></mtu>
        </defaultRoute>
    </staticRouting>
    <ospf>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <defaultOriginate></defaultOriginate>
        <gracefulRestart></gracefulRestart>
        <ospfAreas>
            <ospfArea>
                <areaId></areaId>
                <type></type>
                <authentication>
                    <type></type>
                    <value></value>
                </authentication>
            </ospfArea>
        </ospfAreas>
        <ospfInterfaces>
            <ospfInterface>
                <vnic></vnic>
                <areaId></areaId>
                <helloInterval></helloInterval>
                <deadInterval></deadInterval>
                <priority></priority>
                <cost></cost>
            </ospfInterface>
        </ospfInterfaces>
        <redistribution>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <rules>
                <rule>
                    <prefixName></prefixName>
                    <from>
                        <isis></isis>
                        <ospf></ospf>
                        <bgp></bgp>
                        <static></static>
                        <connected></connected>
                    </from>
                    <action></action>
                </rule>
            </rules>
        </redistribution>
    </ospf>
    <isis>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <systemId></systemId>
        <areaIds>
            <areaId></areaId>
        </areaIds>
        <isType></isType>
        <domainPassword></domainPassword>
        <areaPassword></areaPassword>
        <isisInterfaces>
            <isisInterface>
                <vnic></vnic>
                <meshGroup></meshGroup>
                <helloInterval></helloInterval>
                <helloMultiplier></helloMultiplier>
                <lspInterval></lspInterval>
                <metric></metric>
                <priority></priority>
                <circuitType></circuitType>
                <password></password>
            </isisInterface>
        </isisInterfaces>
        <redistribution>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <rules>
                <rule>
                    <prefixName></prefixName>
                    <from>
                        <isis></isis>
                        <ospf></ospf>
                        <bgp></bgp>
                        <static></static>
                        <connected></connected>
                    </from>
                    <action></action>
                </rule>
            </rules>
        </redistribution>
    </isis>
    <bgp>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <localAS></localAS>
        <bgpNeighbours>
            <bgpNeighbour>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
                <remoteAS></remoteAS>
                <weight></weight>
                <holdDownTimer></holdDownTimer>
                <keepAliveTimer></keepAliveTimer>
                <password></password>
                <bgpFilters>
                    <bgpFilter>
                        <direction></direction>
                        <action></action>
                        <network></network>
                        <ipPrefixGe></ipPrefixGe>
                        <ipPrefixLe></ipPrefixLe>
                    </bgpFilter>
                </bgpFilters>
            </bgpNeighbour>
        </bgpNeighbours>
        <redistribution>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <rules>
                <rule>
                    <prefixName></prefixName>
                    <from>
                        <isis></isis>
                        <ospf></ospf>
                        <bgp></bgp>
                        <static></static>
                        <connected></connected>
                    </from>
                    <action></action>
                </rule>
            </rules>
        </redistribution>
    </bgp>
</routing>

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete the routing config stored in the NSX Mgr database and the default routes from the specified NSX Edge appliance

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/global put get

                                                                                                                                                                      Global configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure global route

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve routing info from NSX Mgr database (default route settings, static route configurations)

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/global

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure global route

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <routingGlobalConfig>
    <routerId></routerId>
        <ecmp></ecmp>
    <logging>
        <enable></enable>
        <logLevel></logLevel>
    </logging>
    <ipPrefixes>
        <ipPrefix>
            <name></name>
            <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        </ipPrefix>
    </ipPrefixes>
</routingGlobalConfig>

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/global

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve routing info from NSX Mgr database (default route settings, static route configurations)

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/static get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Static and default routes for specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Read static and default routes

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure static and default routes

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete both static and default routing config stored in the NSX Mgr database

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/static

                                                                                                                                                                      Read static and default routes

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/static

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure static and default routes

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <staticRouting>
    <staticRoutes>
        <route>
            <description></description>
            <vnic></vnic>
            <network></network>
            <nextHop></nextHop>
            <mtu></mtu>
        </route>
    </staticRoutes>
    <defaultRoute>
        <description></description>
        <vnic></vnic>
        <gatewayAddress></gatewayAddress>
        <mtu></mtu>
    </defaultRoute>
</staticRouting>

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/static

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      <ospf>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <ospfAreas>
        <ospfArea>
            <areaId></areaId>
            <type></type>

                <type></type>
                <value></value>
            </authentication>
        </ospfArea>
    </ospfAreas>

        <ospfInterface>
            <vnic></vnic>
            <areaId></areaId>

            <deadInterval></deadInterval>
            <priority></priority>
            <cost></cost>
        </ospfInterface>
    </ospfInterfaces>

        <enabled></enabled>

            <rule>
                <prefixName></prefixName>
                <from>
                    <isis></isis>
                    <ospf></ospf>
                    <bgp></bgp>
                    <static></static>
                    <connected></connected>
                </from>
                <action></action>
            </rule>
        </rules>
    </redistribution>
</ospf>

                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure load balancer

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <loadBalancer>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <enableServiceInsertion></enableServiceInsertion>
    <accelerationEnabled></accelerationEnabled>
    <logging>
        <enable></enable>
        <logLevel></logLevel>
    </logging>
    <virtualServer>
        <virtualServerId></virtualServerId>
        <name></name>
        <description></description>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <port></port>
        <connectionLimit></connectionLimit>
        <connectionRateLimit></connectionRateLimit>
        <applicationProfileId></applicationProfileId>
        <defaultPoolId></defaultPoolId>
        <enableServiceInsertion></enableServiceInsertion>
        <accelerationEnabled></accelerationEnabled>
    </virtualServer>
    <applicationProfile>
        <applicationProfileId></applicationProfileId>
        <name></name>
        <insertXForwardedFor></insertXForwardedFor>
        <sslPassthrough></sslPassthrough>
        <persistence>
            <method></method>
            <cookieName></cookieName>
            <cookieMode></cookieMode>
        </persistence>
    </applicationProfile>
    <pool>
        <poolId></poolId>
        <name></name>
        <description></description>
        <transparent></transparent>
        <algorithm></algorithm>
        <monitorId></monitorId>
        <member>
            <memberId></memberId>
            <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            <weight></weight>
            <port></port>
            <minConn></minConn>
            <maxConn></maxConn>
            <name></name>
        </member>
    </pool>
    <monitor>
        <monitorId></monitorId>
        <type></type>
        <interval></interval>
        <timeout></timeout>
        <maxRetries></maxRetries>
        <method></method>
        <url></url>
        <name></name>
    </monitor>
</loadBalancer>

                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      • appruleID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified application rule

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <applicationRule>
    <name></name>
    <script></script>
</applicationRule>

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/applicationrules/{appruleID}

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete an application rule

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      • appruleID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified application rule

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/monitors post get delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Load balancer monitors define health check parameters for a particular type of network traffic

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Add a load balancer monitor

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve all load balancer monitors

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete all load balancer monitors

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/monitors

                                                                                                                                                                      Add a load balancer monitor

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <monitor>
    <type></type>
    <interval></interval>
    <timeout></timeout>
    <maxRetries></maxRetries>
    <method></method>
    <url></url>
    <name></name>
</monitor>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/virtualservers post get delete

                                                                                                                                                                      You can add an NSX Edge internal or uplink interface as a virtual server

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Add a virtual server

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve all virtual servers

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete all

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/virtualservers
