                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <virtualServer>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    <protocol></protocol>
    <port></port>
    <connectionLimit></connectionLimit>
    <connectionRateLimit></connectionRateLimit>
    <applicationProfileId></applicationProfileId>
    <defaultPoolId></defaultPoolId>
    <enableServiceInsertion></enableServiceInsertion>
    <accelerationEnabled></accelerationEnabled>
</virtualServer>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/pools post get delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Server pools manage load balancer distribution methods and has a monitor attached to it for health check parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Add a load balancer server pool to the Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Get all backend pools for the specified NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete all backend pools configured on the specified NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/pools

                                                                                                                                                                      Add a load balancer server pool to the Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <pool>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <transparent></transparent>
    <algorithm></algorithm>
    <monitorId></monitorId>
    <member>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        <weight></weight>
        <port></port>
        <minConn></minConn>
        <maxConn></maxConn>
        <name></name>
        <monitorPort></monitorPort>
    </member>
</pool>

                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

    <enabled></enabled>

    </dnsServers>

        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </listeners>
    <logging>
        <logLevel></logLevel>
        <enable></enable>
    </logging>
</dns>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure DHCP for NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Get DHCP configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure DHCP service

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete the DHCP configuration, restoring it to factory default

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Get DHCP configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure DHCP service

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <dhcp>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <staticBindings>
        <staticBinding>
            <macAddress></macAddress>
            <vmId></vmId>
            <vnicId></vnicId>
            <hostname></hostname>
            <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            <subnetMask></subnetMask>
            <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
            <domainName></domainName>
            <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
            <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
            <leaseTime></leaseTime>
            <autoConfigDNS></autoConfigDNS>
        </staticBinding>
    </staticBindings>
    <ipPools>
        <ipPool>
            <ipRange></ipRange>
            <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
            <subnetMask></subnetMask>
            <domainName></domainName>
            <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
            <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
            <leaseTime></leaseTime>
            <autoConfigDNS></autoConfigDNS>
        </ipPool>
    </ipPools>
    <logging>
        <enable></enable>
        <logLevel></logLevel>
    </logging>
</dhcp>

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete the DHCP configuration, restoring it to factory default

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config/ippools post

                                                                                                                                                                      Adding IP pools to DHCP configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Add an IP pool to the DHCP configuration. returns a pool ID within a Location HTTP header

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config/ippools

                                                                                                                                                                      Add an IP pool to the DHCP configuration. returns a pool ID within a Location HTTP header

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <ipPool>
   <ipRange></ipRange>
   <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
   <domainName></domainName>
   <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
   <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
   <leaseTime></leaseTime>
   <autoConfigureDNS></autoConfigureDNS>
</ipPool>

                                                                                                                                                                      Adding static-binding to DHCP configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Append a static-binding to DHCP config. A static-binding ID is returned within a Location HTTP header

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config/bindings

                                                                                                                                                                      Append a static-binding to DHCP config. A static-binding ID is returned within a Location HTTP header

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <staticBinding>
   <vmId></vmId>
   <vnicId></vnicId>
   <hostname></hostname>
   <ipAddress></ipAddress>
   <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
   <domainName></domainName>
   <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
   <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
   <leaseTime></leaseTime>
   <autoConfigureDNS></autoConfigureDNS>
</staticBinding>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config/bindings/{bindingID} delete

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <highAvailability>
    <vnic></vnic>
    <ipAddresses>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </ipAddresses>
    <declareDeadTime></declareDeadTime>
    <enabled><enabled>
</highAvailability>

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/highavailability/config

                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/syslog/config get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Manage SSL VPN

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Enable or disable SSL VPN

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve SSL VPN details

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Reconfigure the entire SSL VPN

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete the SSL VPN configurations on the Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • enableService: required (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                        Set to true to enable, false to disable

                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/privatenetworks post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure a private network to expose to remote users over SSL VPN tunnel

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Add a private network

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Get all private network profiles in the SSL VPN instance

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Update all private network configs of NSX Edge with the given list of private network configs. If the config is present, it is updated; otherwise, a new private network config is created. Existing configs not included in the call body are deleted

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete all Private Networks from the SSL VPN instance

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/privatenetworks

                                                                                                                                                                      Add a private network

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <privateNetwork>
    <description></description>
    <network></network>
    <sendOverTunnel>
        <ports></ports>
        <optimize></optimize>
    </sendOverTunnel>
    <enabled></enabled>
</privateNetwork>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/ippools post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      IP pools to assign IP addresses to remote users

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Create an IP pool

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Get all IP pools configured on SSL VPN

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Update all IP pools with the given list of pools. If the pool is present, it is updated; otherwise, a new pool is created. Existing pools not in the body are deleted

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete all IP pools configured on SSL VPN

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/ippools

                                                                                                                                                                      Create an IP pool

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <ipAddressPool>
    <description></description>
    <ipRange></ipRange>
    <netmask></netmask>
    <gateway></gateway>
    <primaryDns></primaryDns>
    <secondaryDns></secondaryDns>
    <dnsSuffix></dnsSuffix>
    <winsServer></winsServer>
    <enabled></enabled>
</ipAddressPool>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/clientconfig put get

                                                                                                                                                                      Advanced parameters for full access client configurations--such as whether client should auto-reconnect in case of network failures or network unavailability, or whether the client should be uninstalled after logout

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Set parameters for full access client configurations

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Get client configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/clientconfig

                                                                                                                                                                      <clientConfiguration>
    <autoReconnect></autoReconnect>
    <fullTunnel>
        <excludeLocalSubnets></excludeLocalSubnets>
        <gatewayIp></gatewayIp>
    </fullTunnel>
    <upgradeNotification></upgradeNotification>
</clientConfiguration>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/installpackages post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Installation packages for SSL VPN clients

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Create installers for full access network clients. These setup binaries are downloaded by remote clients and installed on their systems.

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Get information about all installation packages

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Update all installation packages with the given list. If the package is present, it is updated; otherwise a new installation package is created. Existing packages not included in the body are deleted.

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete all client installation packages

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/installpackages

                                                                                                                                                                      Create installers for full access network clients. These setup binaries are downloaded by remote clients and installed on their systems.

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <clientInstallPackage>
    <profileName></profileName>
    <gatewayList>
        <gateway>
            <hostName></hostName>
            <port></port>
        </gateway>
    </gatewayList>
    <startClientOnLogon></startClientOnLogon>
    <hideSystrayIcon></hideSystrayIcon>
    <rememberPassword></rememberPassword>
    <silentModeOperation></silentModeOperation>
    <silentModeInstallation></silentModeInstallation>
    <hideNetworkAdaptor></hideNetworkAdaptor>
    <createDesktopIcon></createDesktopIcon>
    <enforceServerSecurityCertValidation></enforceServerSecurityCertValidation>
    <createLinuxClient></createLinuxClient>
    <createMacClient></createMacClient>
    <description></description>
    <enabled></enabled>
</clientInstallPackage>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/webresources post get delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Web access server that a remote user can connect to via a web browser

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Add portal web resource

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Get all web resources on the SSL VPN instance

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete all web resources on the SSL VPN instance

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/webresources

                                                                                                                                                                      Add portal web resource

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <webResource>
    <name></name>
    <url></url>
    <method name="">
        <data></data>
    </method>
    <description></description>
    <enabled></enabled>
</webResource>

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/webresources

                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

    <userId></userId>
    <password></password>
    <firstName></firstName>
    <lastName></lastName>
    <description></description>
    <disableUserAccount></disableUserAccount>
    <passwordNeverExpires></passwordNeverExpires>
    <allowChangePassword>
        <changePasswordOnNextLogin></changePasswordOnNextLogin>
    </allowChangePassword>
</user>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/settings get put

                                                                                                                                                                      Authentication settings

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Get information about authentication server

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Set authentication process for remote users. Specify username/password authentication, active directory, ldap, radius, client certificate based authentication

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/settings

                                                                                                                                                                      Get information about authentication server

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/settings

                                                                                                                                                                      Set authentication process for remote users. Specify username/password authentication, active directory, ldap, radius, client certificate based authentication

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <authenticationConfig>
    <passwordAuthentication>
    <authenticationTimeout></authenticationTimeout>
        <primaryAuthServers>
            <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LdapAuthServerDto>
                <ip></ip>
                <port></port>
                <timeOut></timeOut>
                <enableSsl></enableSsl>
                <searchBase></searchBase>
                <bindDomainName></bindDomainName>
                <bindPassword></bindPassword>
                <loginAttributeName></loginAttributeName>
                <searchFilter></searchFilter>
                <enabled></enabled>
            </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LdapAuthServerDto>
            <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RadiusAuthServerDto>
                <ip></ip>
                <port></port>
                <timeOut></timeOut>
                <secret></secret>
                <nasIp></nasIp>
                <retryCount></retryCount>
            </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RadiusAuthServerDto>
            <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LocalAuthServerDto>
                <enabled></enabled>
                <passwordPolicy>
                    <minLength></minLength>
                    <maxLength></maxLength>
                    <minAlphabets></minAlphabets>
                    <minDigits></minDigits>
                    <minSpecialChar></minSpecialChar>
                    <allowUserIdWithinPassword></allowUserIdWithinPassword>
                    <passwordLifeTime></passwordLifeTime>
                    <expiryNotification></expiryNotification>
                </passwordPolicy>
                <accountLockoutPolicy>
                    <retryCount></retryCount>
                    <retryDuration></retryDuration>
                    <lockoutDuration></lockoutDuration>
                </accountLockoutPolicy>
            </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LocalAuthServerDto>
            <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RsaAuthServerDto>
                <timeOut>20</timeOut>
                <sourceIp>1.2.2.3</sourceIp>
            </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RsaAuthServerDto>
        </primaryAuthServers>
        <secondaryAuthServer>
            <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.AdAuthServerDto>
                <ip>1.1.1.1</ip>
                <port>90</port>
                <timeOut>20</timeOut>
                <enableSsl>false</enableSsl>
               <searchBase>searchbasevalue</searchBase>
               <bindDomainName>binddnvalue</bindDomainName>
                <bindPassword>password</bindPassword>
                <loginAttributeName>cain</loginAttributeName>
                <searchFilter>found</searchFilter>
                <terminateSessionOnAuthFails>false</terminateSessionOnAuthFails>
                <enabled>true</enabled>
            </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.AdAuthServerDto>
        </secondaryAuthServer>
    </passwordAuthentication>
</authenticationConfig>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/settings/rsaconfigfile post

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Upload RSA config file (See "Generate the Authentication Manager Configuration File" section of the RSA Authentication Manager Administrator's guide for instructions on how to configure and download the RSA config file from RSA Authentication Manager)

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/settings/rsaconfigfile

                                                                                                                                                                      Upload RSA config file (See "Generate the Authentication Manager Configuration File" section of the RSA Authentication Manager Administrator's guide for instructions on how to configure and download the RSA config file from RSA Authentication Manager)

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/advancedconfig get put

                                                                                                                                                                      SSL VPN advanced configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve SSL VPN advanced configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Apply advanced configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/advancedconfig

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve SSL VPN advanced configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/advancedconfig

                                                                                                                                                                      Apply advanced configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <advancedConfig>
    <enableCompression></enableCompression>
    <forceVirtualKeyboard></forceVirtualKeyboard>
    <preventMultipleLogon></preventMultipleLogon>
    <randomizeVirtualkeys></randomizeVirtualkeys>
    <timeout>
        <forcedTimeout></forcedTimeout>
        <sessionIdleTimeout></sessionIdleTimeout>
    </timeout>
    <clientNotification></clientNotification>
    <enablePublicUrlAccess></enablePublicUrlAccess>
    <enableLogging></enableLogging>
</advancedConfig>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/script post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Logon and logoff scripts for NSX Edge gateway

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure parameters associated with the uploaded script file

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve all script configurations for the Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Update all script configurations with the given list of configurations. If the config is present, its is updated; otherwise, a new config is created. Existing configs not included in the body are deleted

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete all script configurations

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/script

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure parameters associated with the uploaded script file

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <logonLogoffScript>
    <scriptFileId></scriptFileId>
    <type></type>
    <description></description>
    <enabled></enabled>
</logonLogoffScript>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/auth/localusers/users put

                                                                                                                                                                      All users of NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Update all users with the given list of users. If the user is present, it is updated. Otherwise, and new user is created. Existing users not included in the body are deleted.

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/auth/localusers/users

                                                                                                                                                                      Update all users with the given list of users. If the user is present, it is updated. Otherwise, and new user is created. Existing users not included in the body are deleted.

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <users>
    <user>
        <userId></userId>
        <password></password>
        <firstName></firstName>
        <lastName></lastName>
        <description></description>
        <disableUserAccount></disableUserAccount>
        <passwordNeverExpires></passwordNeverExpires>
        <allowChangePassword>
            <changePasswordOnNextLogin></changePasswordOnNextLogin>
        </allowChangePassword>
    </user>
</users>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/statistics/dashboard/sslvpn get

                                                                                                                                                                      SSL VPN statistics on the specified NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve SSL VPN statistics on the specified NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/statistics/dashboard/sslvpn

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve SSL VPN statistics on the specified NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • interval: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specify a range; can be 1 - 60 minutes, or oneDay|oneWeek|oneMonth|oneYear. Default is 60 minutes

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/statistics/dashboard/ipsec get

                                                                                                                                                                      get

Default is 1 hour. Other possible values are 1-60 minutes|oneDay|oneWeek|oneMonth|oneYear

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID
