                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      L2 VPN allows you to configure a tunnel between two sites. VM's remain on the same subnet in spite of being moved between these sites, enabling you to extend your datacenter. An NSX Edge at one site can provide all services to VM's on the other site.

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Enable or disable L2 VPN service according to the value of the query parameter "enableService"

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve the current L2VPN configuration for NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure L2VPN for server or client

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete L2 VPN

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Enable or disable L2 VPN service according to the value of the query parameter "enableService"

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • enableService: required (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                        Enable or disable L2 VPN

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve the current L2VPN configuration for NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure L2VPN for server or client

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config/statistics get

                                                                                                                                                                      L2 VPN statistics

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve L2 VPN stats, which has information such as tunnel status, sent bytes, received bytes etc. for the given Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config/statistics

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve L2 VPN stats, which has information such as tunnel status, sent bytes, received bytes etc. for the given Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/autoconfiguration get put

                                                                                                                                                                      Auto config is enabled by default. If you disable, you must add required NAT, firewall, routing rules

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve auto config settings for the Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Change the auto configuration settings for the NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/autoconfiguration

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve auto config settings for the Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/autoconfiguration

                                                                                                                                                                      Change the auto configuration settings for the NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <autoConfiguration>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <rulePriority></rulePriority>
</autoConfiguration>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances post get put

                                                                                                                                                                      Working with Edge appliances

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Change the size of both appliances

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve appliance configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify appliance configuration (tip -- retrieve the config using GET call, then modify the parameters and send as body)

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances

                                                                                                                                                                      Change the size of both appliances

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • size: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        set to compact|large|xlarge

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve appliance configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify appliance configuration (tip -- retrieve the config using GET call, then modify the parameters and send as body)

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances/{haIndex} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Manage a specified appliance using its HA index

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Get configuration of specified appliance

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify the configuration of the specified appliance

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete the appliance

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances/{haIndex}

                                                                                                                                                                      Get configuration of specified appliance

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      • haIndex: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified appliance HA index

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances/{haIndex}

                                                                                                                                                                      Modify the configuration of the specified appliance

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      • haIndex: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified appliance HA index

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <appliance>
    <resourcePoolId></resourcePoolId>
    <datastoreId></datastoreId>
    <hostId></hostId>
    <vmFolderId></vmFolderId>
    <customField>
        <key></key>
        <value></value>
    </customField>
    <cpuReservation>
        <limit></limit>
        <reservation></reservation>
        <shares></shares>
    </cpuReservation>
    <memoryReservation>
        <limit></limit>
        <reservation></reservation>
        <shares></shares>
    </memoryReservation>
</appliance>

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances/{haIndex}

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete the appliance

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      • haIndex: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified appliance HA index

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/vnics post get

                                                                                                                                                                      Working with interfaces. Add up to ten internal/uplink interfaces to each Edge. Each Edge must have at least one internal interface

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Add an interface or sub interface

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve all interfaces for Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/vnics

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • action: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        always set to "patch"

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/vnics

                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/mgmtinterface get put

                                                                                                                                                                      Working with management interfaces for an NSX Edge router

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve all managedment interfaces to the NSX Edge router

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure management interfaces for NSX Edge router

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/mgmtinterface

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve all managedment interfaces to the NSX Edge router

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/mgmtinterface

                                                                                                                                                                      Configure management interfaces for NSX Edge router

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <mgmtInterface>
    <addressGroups>
        <addressGroup>
            <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
            <subnetMask></subnetMask>
        </addressGroup>
    </addressGroups>
    <mtu></mtu>
    <connectedToId></connectedToId>
</mgmtInterface>

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces post get delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Working with all NSX Edge router interfaces

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Add interfaces for NSX Edge router. Can have up to 8 uplink interfaces

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve all interfaces for Edge router

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete interfaces

                                                                                                                                                                      post /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces

                                                                                                                                                                      Add interfaces for NSX Edge router. Can have up to 8 uplink interfaces

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • action: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Always set to 'patch'

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <interfaces>
    <interface>
        <name></name>
        <addressGroups>
            <addressGroup>
                <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
                <subnetMask></subnetMask>
            </addressGroup>
        </addressGroups>
        <mtu></mtu>
        <type></type>
        <isConnected></isConnected>
        <connectedToId></connectedToId>
    </interface>
</interfaces>

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve all interfaces for Edge router

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete interfaces

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • index: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specify index of interface to delete (e.g. ?index=&index=). If no indices specified, all interfaces are deleted

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces/{index} get delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Manage a specific NSX Edge router interface

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve information on specified Edge router interface

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete interface configuration and reset to factory default

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces/{index}

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve information on specified Edge router interface

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      • index: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified router interface

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces/{index}

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete interface configuration and reset to factory default

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/jobs get

                                                                                                                                                                      NSX Edge async jobs

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Query jobs. Assumes Edge is configured in async mode, where ?async=true is used at the end of any 4.0 service configuration URI for POST, PUT, and DELETE calls.

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/jobs

                                                                                                                                                                      Query jobs. Assumes Edge is configured in async mode, where ?async=true is used at the end of any 4.0 service configuration URI for POST, PUT, and DELETE calls.

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • status: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        status set to "all" or "active"

                                                                                                                                                                      /4.0/edges/jobs/{jobId} get

                                                                                                                                                                      Status of Edge async jobs. Assumes Edge is configured in async mode, where ?async=true is used at the end of any 4.0 service configuration URI for POST, PUT, and DELETE calls.

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve job status (SUCCESS/FAILED/QUEUED/RUNNING/ROLLBACK), URI of the resource, and ID of the resource as shown in response body

                                                                                                                                                                      get /4.0/edges/jobs/{jobId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve job status (SUCCESS/FAILED/QUEUED/RUNNING/ROLLBACK), URI of the resource, and ID of the resource as shown in response body

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • jobId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Job ID

                                                                                                                                                                      nsxEdgeUpgrade

                                                                                                                                                                      Upgrading NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      /3.0/edges/{edgeID} post

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Upgrade NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      post /3.0/edges/{edgeID}

                                                                                                                                                                      Upgrade NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • edgeID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • action: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Set this to 'upgrade'

                                                                                                                                                                      truststore

                                                                                                                                                                      Operation on truststore (certificates)

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/truststore/certificate post

                                                                                                                                                                      Create certificate for CSR

                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <trustObject>
    <pemEncoding></pemEncoding>
</trustObject>

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/scope/{scopeId} get

                                                                                                                                                                      Certificates for a scope

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Query all certificates for a scope

                                                                                                                                                                      get /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/scope/{scopeId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Query all certificates for a scope

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • scopeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Scope ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/{scopeId} post

                                                                                                                                                                      Working with vShield Edge self-signed certificates

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Create a single certificate

                                                                                                                                                                      post /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/{scopeId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Create a single certificate

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • scopeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Scope ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <trustObject>
    <pemEncoding></pemEncoding>
    <privateKey></privateKey>
    <passphrase></passphrase>
</trustObject>

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/{certificateId} get delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Certificate specified by ID

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve the certificate object specified by ID. If the ID specifies a chain, multiple certificate objects are retrieved.

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete the specified certificate

                                                                                                                                                                      get /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/{certificateId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve the certificate object specified by ID. If the ID specifies a chain, multiple certificate objects are retrieved.

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • certificateId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        certificate ID

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/{certificateId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete the specified certificate

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • certificateId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        certificate ID

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/truststore/csr/{scopeId} post

                                                                                                                                                                      Create Certificate Signing Requests (CSRs)

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Create a CSR

                                                                                                                                                                      post /2.0/services/truststore/csr/{scopeId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Create a CSR

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • scopeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified scope ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <csr>
    <subject>
        <attribute>
            <key></key>
            <value></value>
        </attribute>
    </subject>
    <algorithm></algorithm>
    <keySize></keySize>
</csr>

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/truststore/csr/{csrId} put get

                                                                                                                                                                      Self signed certificate for CSR

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Create a self signed certificate for CSR

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve specific CSR

                                                                                                                                                                      put /2.0/services/truststore/csr/{csrId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Create a self signed certificate for CSR

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • csrId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        CSR ID

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • noOfDays: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                      get /2.0/services/truststore/csr/{csrId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • csrId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                      • scopeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified scope

                                                                                                                                                                      <trustObject>
    <pemEncoding></pemEncoding>
</trustObject>

                                                                                                                                                                      get
