                                                                                                                                                                      get /2.0/services/truststore/crl/scope/{scopeId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve all certificates for the specified scope

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • scopeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified scope

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/truststore/crl/{crlId} get delete

                                                                                                                                                                      CRL certificates for specified certificate

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve certificate object for specified crlID

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete the specified CRL

                                                                                                                                                                      get /2.0/services/truststore/crl/{crlId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve certificate object for specified crlID

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • crlId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        CRL ID

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /2.0/services/truststore/crl/{crlId}

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete the specified CRL

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • crlId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        CRL ID

                                                                                                                                                                      policy

                                                                                                                                                                      Operations on policy objects

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy post

                                                                                                                                                                      Working with security policies (Endpoint, firewall, network introspection services applied to security group)

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Create a security policy

                                                                                                                                                                      post /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy

                                                                                                                                                                      Create a security policy

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <securityPolicy>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <precedence></precedence>
    <parent>
        <objectId></objectId>
    </parent>
    <securityGroupBinding>
        <objectId></objectId>
    </securityGroupBinding>
    <actionsByCategory>
        <category></category>
        <action class="">
            <name></name>
            <description></description>
            <category></category>
            <actionType></actionType>
            <isActionEnforced></isActionEnforced>
            <isActive></isActive>
            <isEnabled></isEnabled>
            <secondarySecurityGroup>
                <objectId></objectId>
            </secondarySecurityGroup>
            <applications>
                <application>
                    <objectId></objectId>
                </application>
                <applicationGroup>
                    <objectId></objectId>
                </applicationGroup>
            </applications>
            <logged></logged>
            <scope>
                <id></id>
                <name></name>
                <objectTypeName></objectTypeName>
            </scope>
        </action>
        <direction></direction>
        <outsideSecondaryContainer></outsideSecondaryContainer>
    </actionsByCategory>
</securityPolicy>

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/{ID} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Specific security policy

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve security policy information

                                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                                      Edit a security policy

                                                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete a security policy

                                                                                                                                                                      get /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/{ID}

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve security policy information

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        ID of desired security policy (or 'all' to include all security policies for the securityPolicyID read method)

                                                                                                                                                                      put /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/{ID}

                                                                                                                                                                      Edit a security policy

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        ID of desired security policy (or 'all' to include all security policies for the securityPolicyID read method)

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <securityPolicy>
    <securityPolicy>
        <name></name>
        <description></description>
        <precedence></precedence>
        <parent>
            <objectId></objectId>
        </parent>
        <securityGroupBinding>
            <objectId></objectId>
        </securityGroupBinding>
        <actionsByCategory>
            <category></category>
            <action class="">
                <name></name>
                <description></description>
                <category></category>
                <actionType></actionType>
                <isActionEnforced></isActionEnforced>
                <isActive></isActive>
                <isEnabled></isEnabled>
                <secondarySecurityGroup>
                    <objectId></objectId>
                </secondarySecurityGroup>
                <applications>
                    <application>
                        <objectId></objectId>
                    </application>
                    <applicationGroup>
                        <objectId></objectId>
                    </applicationGroup>
                </applications>
                <logged></logged>
                <scope>
                    <id></id>
                    <name></name>
                    <objectTypeName></objectTypeName>
                </scope>
            </action>
            <direction></direction>
            <outsideSecondaryContainer></outsideSecondaryContainer>
        </actionsByCategory>
    </securityPolicy>
</securityPolicy>

                                                                                                                                                                      delete /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/{ID}

                                                                                                                                                                      Delete a security policy

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        ID of desired security policy (or 'all' to include all security policies for the securityPolicyID read method)

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • force: (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                        If set to true, security policy is deleted even if it is being used somewhere

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/{ID}/securityactions get

                                                                                                                                                                      Security actions for a security policy

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve security actions for a security policy

                                                                                                                                                                      get /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/{ID}/securityactions

                                                                                                                                                                      Retrieve security actions for a security policy

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        ID of desired security policy (or 'all' to include all security policies for the securityPolicyID read method)

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/hierarchy post get

                                                                                                                                                                      Security policy configuration import/export

                                                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                                                      Import a security policy configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Export a Service Composer configuration and save to your desktop for use as a backup

                                                                                                                                                                      post /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/hierarchy

                                                                                                                                                                      Import a security policy configuration

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • suffix: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        (optional) Added after names

                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                      <securityPolicyHierarchy>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <securityPolicy></securityPolicy>
    <securityGroup></securityGroup>
</securityPolicyHierarchy>

                                                                                                                                                                      get /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/hierarchy

                                                                                                                                                                      Export a Service Composer configuration and save to your desktop for use as a backup

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • policyIds: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Comma separated security policy id's

                                                                                                                                                                      • prefix: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        (optional) Some prefix to add before the names of the objects in the exported XML

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/policy/securityaction/category/virtualmachines get

                                                                                                                                                                      Virtual machines for a security action

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Fetch all vm objects on which security action of a given category and attribute has been applied

                                                                                                                                                                      get /2.0/services/policy/securityaction/category/virtualmachines

                                                                                                                                                                      Fetch all vm objects on which security action of a given category and attribute has been applied

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • attributeKey: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Attribute name

                                                                                                                                                                      • attributeValue: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Attribute value

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/policy/securitygroup/{ID}/securityactions get

                                                                                                                                                                      Security actions on a security group

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Query all security actions applicable on a security group

                                                                                                                                                                      get /2.0/services/policy/securitygroup/{ID}/securityactions

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                      • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                        Specified security group

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/policy/virtualmachine/{ID}/securityactions get

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                                      /2.0/services/policy/policy/serviceprovider/firewall get

                                                                                                                                                                      Synchronizing Service Composer rules with distributed firewall

                                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                                      Query the time since when Service Composer firewall is out of sync with dfw, or synchronize Service Composer firewall with dfw

                                                                                                                                                                      get /2.0/services/policy/policy/serviceprovider/firewall

                                                                                                                                                                      Query the time since when Service Composer firewall is out of sync with dfw, or synchronize Service Composer firewall with dfw

                                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                                        /2.0/services/policy/policy/securitygroup/{ID}/securitypolicies get

                                                                                                                                                                        get

                                                                                                                                                                        Retrieve security policies mapped to a security group

                                                                                                                                                                        get /2.0/services/policy/policy/securitygroup/{ID}/securitypolicies
